description: This file is a React component for a login page. It handles user login via a form, manages form state and error display, and interacts with external authentication and API functions.

methods.name: LoginPage
methods.description: Functional React component that renders a login form, manages form submission, error handling, and user authentication.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission: prevents default behavior, retrieves form data, calls login API, updates auth state, and handles errors.
